name: Sector 9
description:
WARNING: Light Blood, Light Deaths. Jumpscares

Summary: Returning from a mission, the captain finds her base abandoned. While investigating, strange things start to happen.

Game

  • Modes: Singleplayer
  • Genre:  Point & Click, Visual Novel, Hidden Object, Puzzle
  • Theme: Horror, Fantasy, Adventure
  • Tags:  Female Protagonist, Indie
  • Languages: English, Spanish
  • Aspect Ratio: 16:9 (Native 854 x 480)

Controls

  • Left Click
  • Middle Click - Toggle Hints (interactive stuff)
  • Scroll Up - Inventory

Credits

  • Programing / Writing / Gui - Dino Gonzalez
  • Music (Nothing Yet)
  • Backgrounds - Possibly getting some help here

ATM Demo is almost ready. Just need to finish the inventory system. interaction between items and stuff. not too worried about it. I'll have it up in no time. Already got a lot of the really hard stuff out of the way.
